title: Global organic chocolate market size 2012 to 2018
yAxis: Market size in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market size in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 2 data points.
Overall Market size in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Market size in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2018.
Maximum Market size in million U.S. dollars, about 886.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Market size in million U.S. dollars, of value 734.0 was reported at Year 2012
